Posts.Content: i have 3 lumps in my left breast,2 that have gotten a little bigger.occasionally i will wake up at night and be either on my back or my left side and when i start to roll over my breast will be numb and it feels like someone is ripping my chest apart.my dr said from just feeling my breast he thought they were just cysts.i finally got him to do an ultrasound and it didnt show any lumps at all.i have had nipple discharge also and bad pain.why would the us not show anything when i and my dr have felt the lumps?now my dr wont consider any more test since the us didnt show anything. i just need some advice. thanks and GOD BLESS tammy
Posts.Title: question about breast ultrasound

Posts.Content: Thank you. I got tired of waiting for the free clinic and my husband made me go to the ER after the pain got so bad that I had trouble sleeping last night. They did an ultrasound and a mammogram. They said the mammogram was inconclussive but the tech was still reading it. The ultrasound found a mass that apparently is not fluid filled. The dr. told me it is the size of my pinkie. He has put me on antibiotics but said he didnt think they would work. Which confused me. He has referred me to a surgeon and said he wants it cut out and checked to see if it is malignant or benign. I am totally scared now. I am trying not to be but it is hard. My breast really hurts now that they did the mammogram. I have to call the surgeon tomorrow and set my appointment up. Any advice on this outcome? Thank you.
Posts.Title: Worried

Posts.Content: They are getting me in today. I go this afternoon. The mammogram showed the same as the ultrasound. A mass close to 2 cm. The report also showed that their opinion was to have it cut out. I will post after I know anything. Thank you.
Posts.Title: Worried

Posts.Content: I called the surgeon today and they can not see me until the 24th. So more waiting. The nurse from the er told me she would call the oncologist and let them look at my scans and see what they say. May be worth a try. Just tired of waiting and hurting...
Posts.Title: Worried

Posts.Content: Had my surgery yesterday. Thank God it was an abscess and not cancer. I have a drain tube in my breast until Tuesday. Am in pain but thankful. Thank you so much for your support. God Bless you.
Posts.Title: Worried

Posts.Content: Ok here goes. I am 40, female, in perimenopause because of a hysterectomy that took everything but one ovary. My mother has had ovarian cancer. Here is my question. I have noticed over the last week my left nipple has been real sore. I can not even stand for anything to brush over it. I have also noticed the nipple has a hard lump on the right side of it and it is pushing my nipple to the left. Also when I lay on my back to do my breast exam my right nipple of course stands up, but my left one, the one with the lump goes into my breast. I havent noticed any discharge, just painful, hard and bigger than the right one. I am trying to get an appointment with the free clinic here because I was laid off from the public school system due to budget cuts and have no insurance now. Any ideas what this may be? Thank you.
Posts.Title: Worried
